DataElement.preferredName: Preventive Intervention Therapeutic Procedure Administered Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe other preventive intervention therapeutic procedure that was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: In medicine, action taken to decrease the chance of getting a disease or condition. For example, cancer prevention includes avoiding risk factors (such as smoking, obesity, lack of exercise, and radiation exposure) and increasing protective factors (such as getting regular physical activity, staying at a healthy weight, and having a healthy diet)._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In medicine, action taken to decrease the chance of getting a disease or condition. For example, cancer prevention includes avoiding risk factors (such as smoking, obesity, lack of exercise, and radiation exposure) and increasing protective factors (such as getting regular physical activity, staying at a healthy weight, and having a healthy diet).:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Therapeutic, nutritional, environmental, social and/or behavioral interventions at the societal, community, organizational or individual levels to reduce, modify or stop the course of a disease.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Be specific about something; define clearly._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
